attributes.action: LISTEN TO WHAT CHILDREN IN CARE OR GOING FOR ADOPTION.. REALLY WANT .
attributes.additional_details:
Children have voices.. please lets listen.
Please respect what there saying.
How can children have respect and listen if we dont do it for them ...
Human rights is for all no matter the age.
But our kids are took and noone listens to them.  NOT ALL THE CHILDREN NEED CARE THEY NEED THERE BIRTH FAMILY
IT HAS TO CHANGE THESES KIDS ARE GROWING UP MESSED UP WITH BIGGER ISSUES BY BEING IN CARE OR ADOPTED
attributes.background:
Children in care need to have there wishes heard and respected support and help should be given to help them get what they want ...
Adoptions need to be stopped as its tearing familes apart kids dont always want new mum and dads they want there birth parents.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
